Text: _Wintermute_, you are an absolute star.  Thank you so much for all this great music! :)
hey, what exactly is isotop? there's no wikipedia article and google just turns up a load of torrent sites.
ISOTOP is just a made up label on my MP3-compilations... just wanted something to call them ;-)
cool. Well anyway it rocks! Nice work.

Mr. Wintermute: You are a great compilator. The synthpop/ebm/future/goth industry should hire you as a master compilator because all the commercial available compilations always features 2 or 3 great songs, 2 fair songs and the rest are mediocre or just plain bad songs. You're compilations are great show off of how good this music is and why it should deserve more radio play!
